name: Pong50 For Amiga - By Giuseppe Mignogna
name_original: Pong50 For Amiga - By Giuseppe Mignogna
description:
Pong50 is a Pong Clone to celebrate the 50th  Anniversary of Atari Pong

The game was tested with WINUAE amiga emulator configured for Amiga 1200

Download the ADF, that is a diskette image.
Configure with df0: (or 1 or whatever u want) with the adf just downloaded

In the Amiga screen will apper the diskette icon, click on it, a window with the pong50 wil be opened.

Now double click on the icon (Pong50) inside window.
